Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Relation/ident

Synopsis The identity relation.
Function rel[&T,&T] ident(set[&T] S)
Description The identity relation for set S.
Examples 
rascal>import Relation;
ok
rascal>ident({"mon", "tue", "wed"});
rel[str, str]: {
  <"wed","wed">,
  <"mon","mon">,
  <"tue","tue">
}
